channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stock futures inch higher as investors look ahead to earnings, tariff developments
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed Sunday, as investors await the next tariff developments and a big week of quarterly earnings.

item.title: They shrunk the airport lounge: Why that flight-day haven may be getting smaller
item.description: American Express and American Airlines airport lounges will soon be available in travel-sized versions.

item.title: My brother-in-law left $600K to a friend. He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD. Can my husband contest the will?
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
